channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Which Business Functions Are Delivering The Highest ROI From AI
item.description: The AI return on investment debate is largely over. Companies are no longer asking if it delivers value; they’re asking where it delivers the most val...

item.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Has Sunset 80% Of The Entire Game Thanks To The Portal
item.description: Destiny 2 has sunset most of the game in favor of The Portal in the new Edge of Fate era, and it seems permanent.

item.title: ‘Wednesday’ Season 2 Part 2 Is Essentially ‘Wednesday’ Season 3
item.description: Wednesday season 2 part 2 is nearly here, but the way Netflix is doing this, it's really just a mini season 3.

item.title: A Promising Update On Robert Downey Jr.’s Doctor Doom In ‘Avengers: Doomsday’
item.description: Everyone is a bit skeptical of Robert Downey Jr. returning to the MCU to play Doctor Doom in Avengers: Doomsday, but a new update suggests it might be...

item.title: ChatGPT Parental Controls Will Sound Alert When Child Is Distressed
item.description: New ChatGPT safety measures will let parents monitor teenagers' accounts and receive notifications of concerning conversations.

item.title: Bringing goodwill to the conversation
item.description: Education is distinct from learning. Organized education is a form of indoctrination and certification. Sometimes it leads to learning, but not always...

item.title: Walk away or dance

item.title: Possibility vs. certainty
item.description: It is impossible to make a perpetual motion machine, you’ll waste your time if you try. It is possible to write a book of poetry that will sell 10 mil...

item.title: Food bonus post
